Package scheduling.schedulingStrategies.dvfsStrategies

Interface DVFSStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScaleAllJobsStrategy

    public interface DVFSStrategy
    This interface has to be implemented by any class that is supposed to be used as a strategy that determines the jobs for which the execution frequency is scaled, to reach an adjustment of the power consumption.
    Author:
    nilsw

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<BatchJob> getScalableJobs​(java.util.List<BatchJob> allJobs, int intervalEnd, int currentTime)
      Returns a list that contains all jobs for which a change of the execution frequency would have an impact onto the power consumption profile in the specified interval.
      void scaleFrequencies​(java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs, java.util.List<BatchJob> runningJobs, java.util.List<BatchJob> pausedJobs, java.util.List<BatchJob> scheduledJobs, ReserveProvisionType provisionType, int amountOfNodeStepsToScale, double requestedFrequency, double maximumFrequency, double minimumFrequency, int currentTime, int schedulingInterval, DC handledDC)
      Scales the execution frequencies of selected jobs to achieve adjustment of the power consumption profile.
      void scheduleForMaximumPowerDemand​(java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs, java.util.List<BatchJob> runningJobs, java.util.List<BatchJob> pausedJobs, java.util.List<BatchJob> scheduledJobs, double maximumFrequency, int currentTime, int schedulingInterval, DC handledDC)
      Adjusts the run configurations of the jobs, so that the maximum possible power consumption demand is reached.
      void scheduleForMinimumPowerDemand​(java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs, java.util.List<BatchJob> runningJobs, java.util.List<BatchJob> pausedJobs, java.util.List<BatchJob> scheduledJobs, double minimumFrequency, int currentTime, int schedulingInterval, DC handledDC)
      Adjusts the run configurations of the jobs, so that the minimum possible power consumption demand is reached.

    • Method Detail

      • scaleFrequencies

        void scaleFrequencies​(java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs,
                      java.util.List<BatchJob> runningJobs,
                      java.util.List<BatchJob> pausedJobs,
                      java.util.List<BatchJob> scheduledJobs,
                      ReserveProvisionType provisionType,
                      int amountOfNodeStepsToScale,
                      double requestedFrequency,
                      double maximumFrequency,
                      double minimumFrequency,
                      int currentTime,
                      int schedulingInterval,
                      DC handledDC)
        Scales the execution frequencies of selected jobs to achieve adjustment of the power consumption profile.
        Parameters:
        submittedJobs - List of all jobs that are currently submitted to the scheduler component of the DC.
        runningJobs - List of all jobs that currently run.
        pausedJobs - List of all jobs that are currently paused.
        scheduledJobs - List of all jobs that are currentl scheduled.
        provisionType - Requested reserve power provision type.
        amountOfNodeStepsToScale - Amount of node steps that are requested to be scaled.
        requestedFrequency - CPU frequency to which the selected jobs are requested to be scaled.
        maximumFrequency - Maximum possible CPU frequency.
        minimumFrequency - Minimum possible CPU frequency.
        currentTime - Start of the interval for which the power consumption profile should be adjusted in simulation time.
        schedulingInterval - Lenght of the interval for which the power consumption profile should be adjusted in simulation time.
        handledDC - DC to which the scheduler that uses this strategy belongs.

      • scheduleForMaximumPowerDemand

        void scheduleForMaximumPowerDemand​(java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs,
                                   java.util.List<BatchJob> runningJobs,
                                   java.util.List<BatchJob> pausedJobs,
                                   java.util.List<BatchJob> scheduledJobs,
                                   double maximumFrequency,
                                   int currentTime,
                                   int schedulingInterval,
                                   DC handledDC)
        Adjusts the run configurations of the jobs, so that the maximum possible power consumption demand is reached.
        Parameters:
        submittedJobs - List of all jobs that are currently submitted to the scheduler component of the DC.
        runningJobs - List of all jobs that currently run.
        pausedJobs - List of all jobs that are currently paused.
        scheduledJobs - List of all jobs that are currentl scheduled.
        maximumFrequency - Maximum possible CPU frequency.
        currentTime - Start of the interval for which the power consumption profile should be adjusted in simulation time.
        schedulingInterval - Lenght of the interval for which the power consumption profile should be adjusted in simulation time.
        handledDC - DC to which the scheduler that uses this strategy belongs.

      • scheduleForMinimumPowerDemand

        void scheduleForMinimumPowerDemand​(java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs,
                                   java.util.List<BatchJob> runningJobs,
                                   java.util.List<BatchJob> pausedJobs,
                                   java.util.List<BatchJob> scheduledJobs,

        Adjusts the run configurations of the jobs, so that the minimum possible power consumption demand is reached.
        Parameters:
        submittedJobs - List of all jobs that are currently submitted to the scheduler component of the DC.
        runningJobs - List of all jobs that currently run.

      • getScalableJobs

        java.util.List<BatchJob> getScalableJobs​(java.util.List<BatchJob> allJobs,
                                         int intervalEnd,
                                         int currentTime)
        Returns a list that contains all jobs for which a change of the execution frequency would have an impact onto the power consumption profile in the specified interval.
        Parameters:
        allJobs - List of all jobs.
        intervalEnd - Point in simulation time at which the interval for which the power consumption profile should be adjusted ends.
        currentTime - Point in simulation time at which the interval for which the power consumption profile should be adjusted starts.
        Returns:
        List of jobs for which the change of the execution frequency would have an impact onto the power consumption profile of the DC in the specified interval.
